participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity.
I've had to protect myself from bullies, but I'm not a fighter by nature.
I enjoy driving my Ford truck to work as a security guard.
i like to train dogs.
My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.

participant_2.background:
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
i always sleep 8 hours a day.
i have never had alcohol.
my hair is colored purple.
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Not bad, not bad. Just got done working as a security guard.
Cool! What do you like about that job?
I get to drive my Ford truck, train dogs, and I enjoy helping people.
That sounds really cool. I'm a stay at home mom. I love being home with my son. I love seeing his face light up when he sees his new toys.
Aww, that's sweet. I don't think I could handle being a stay at home mom. I'm too used to working.
It takes some getting used to, but it's really rewarding.
Yeah, I could imagine. I'm glad you're happy with your life.
What do you do for fun?
I like to go out with my friends, go shopping, and I love playing with my cats.
That sounds fun. I like to play video games, go to the movies, and I like to cook.
I love to cook too! I'm always trying new recipes.
Nice! I'm not very good at cooking, but I'm learning.
That's good! You should keep practicing. You'll get better with time.
